entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
